body:
**Describe the bug**

The confirm button states on the extension install modal isn't updated accordingly. The `No` button should probably be hidden when `Processing` a new install. Doesn't do anything when clicked though. 



**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Try to install a new extension via direct link e.g from the [directory](https://block.github.io/goose/v1/extensions/)
2. Click on 'Yes'

**Expected behavior**
A clear state update showing that the install is processing. 

**Screenshots**
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8160f3cd-72de-4532-a704-5a6fd5d42444)
title: Extension install confirm dialog options not updating correctly.
